messages.subject: Japanese History Book Search
messages.msgSnippet: I am currently on the search for the book Historical and Geographical Dictonary of Japan by Papinot. All the copies i can find are between 100$ and 400$.
messages.messageBody:
I am currently on the search for the book "Historical and
Geographical Dictonary of Japan" by Papinot. All the copies i can
find are between 100$ and 400$. Anyone have any leads where a copy
can be picked up for under $50? I know the newest version was
published in 1988, and should be a LOT cheaper...
C.E.West
